languages.text: "Несколько месяцев назад. Человек задохнулся под оползнем из зерна. Прикажете провести опознание?"
"Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"
languages.original_text: "Несколько месяцев назад. Человек задохнулся под оползнем из зерна. Прикажете провести опознание?"

traits.locale_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"
"Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

"Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"
"Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

languages.text: «Hace varios meses, como mínimo. La víctima se asfixió bajo una avalancha de trigo. ¿Procedemos a identificarlo?».
languages.original_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

traits.locale_text: «Hace varios meses, como mínimo. La víctima se asfixió bajo una avalancha de trigo. ¿Procedemos a identificarlo?».

languages.text: “至少是几个月前了，死者应该是被一大堆滑落的谷物活活压死的。要进行身份鉴定吗？”
languages.original_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

traits.locale_text: “至少是几个月前了，死者应该是被一大堆滑落的谷物活活压死的。要进行身份鉴定吗？”

languages.text: 「少なくとも数ヶ月前でしょう。滑り落ちた大量の穀物の中で窒息したようです。身元の特定を進めた方がよろしいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも数ヶ月前でしょう。滑り落ちた大量の穀物の中で窒息したようです。身元の特定を進めた方がよろしいでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Vor mehreren Monaten. Mindestens. Das Opfer ist unter einer Lawine aus Getreide erstickt. Sollen wir mit der Identifizierung fortfahren?"
languages.original_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

traits.locale_text: "Vor mehreren Monaten. Mindestens. Das Opfer ist unter einer Lawine aus Getreide erstickt. Sollen wir mit der Identifizierung fortfahren?"

languages.text: « Plusieurs mois au bas mot. La victime a été asphyxiée sous une avalanche de grain. Devons-nous procéder à son identification ? »
languages.original_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

traits.locale_text: « Plusieurs mois au bas mot. La victime a été asphyxiée sous une avalanche de grain. Devons-nous procéder à son identification ? »

languages.text: "En az birkaç ay olmuş. Kurban, üzerine dökülmüş bir tahıl yığının içinde boğularak ölmüş. Kimlik saptamaya geçelim mi?"
languages.original_text: "Several months ago at the least. The victim suffocated under a sliding mass of grain. Are we to proceed with the identification?"

traits.locale_text: "En az birkaç ay olmuş. Kurban, üzerine dökülmüş bir tahıl yığının içinde boğularak ölmüş. Kimlik saptamaya geçelim mi?"
